content: in this legal case two parties referred to as fu gr and fu au were involved in a dispute over the division of coowned properties in rome and pantelleria fu gr requested the division or sale of the properties as well as compensation for exclusive use of the rome property and reimbursement for expenses related to the pantelleria property fu au opposed the division and requested reimbursement for works done on the pantelleria property the court partially granted fu grs request declaring their right to payment and ordering the transfer of sums due to both parties fu aus counterclaim was rejected the court also addressed legal principles regarding the use of common property and compensatory liability the court determined the value of the properties and ordered fu au to pay fu gr a specific amount certain claims for damages and reimbursement of expenses were rejected a draft distribution plan for the sale of the properties was approved and the allocation of costs was addressed the judge made a final decision on the application proposed by fu gr ruling in their favor and ordering payment to be made the decision was made in rome on october 3 2023 and filed on october 6 2023

civil_codes_used: Legislative Decree No. 346 of October 31, 1990, Approval of the consolidated text of provisions concerning inheritance and gift tax
